channel.title: Client Crashes on Login?
channel.description: If it's a super easy fix. Feel free to flame because if it's easy to fix. I can probably fix it :/ Also how do you copy the Terminal? lol Here is Terminal error: [code]Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -11 at Model.method479(Model.java:1044) at ItemDef.method201(ItemDef.java:1240) at ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java:1129) at client.drawInterface(client.java:8586) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:2002) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8381) at client.processDrawing(client.java:9139) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4835) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]

item.title: Client Crashes on Login?
item.dc:creator: @Felon Felon
item.description:
@Felon wrote:

If it’s a super easy fix. Feel free to flame because if it’s easy to fix. I can probably fix it Also how do you copy the Terminal? lol
Here is Terminal error:

Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -11 at Model.method479(Model.java:1044) at ItemDef.method201(ItemDef.java:1240) at ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java:1129) at client.drawInterface(client.java:8586) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:2002) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8381) at client.processDrawing(client.java:9139) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4835) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
